wikipedia_page.main:
Craig Warnock (born 22 February 1970 in Hammersmith, London) is an English actor.Warnock's best known role is that of Kevin in Terry Gilliam's Time Bandits.Warnock has acted in To the Lighthouse, an adaptation of the novel by Virginia Woolf and provides the voice of Dez's dad Clooney from Wishfart.
As a musician Warnock has played keyboards with These Animal Men and Mo Solid Gold.

response: *Time Bandits (1988 TV Asahi edition) – Kevin (Craig Warnock)

|Time Bandits || Terry Gilliam || Craig Warnock, David Rappaport, Kenny Baker, Sean Connery, David Warner, Shelley Duvall, Ian Holm, John Cleese || Fantasy || Marvel Comics published a comic book 1 year later based on the film

During this time, Jacob takes a more direct approach to fighting the Templars. He helps Charles Darwin investigate the addictive "Soothing Syrup" distributed by Starrick, destroying Starrick's factory and killing the person manufacturing the syrup, John Elliotson (Ian D. Clark); assassinates Malcolm Milner (Craig Warnock), the boss of Starrick's omnibus company, and Pearl Attaway (Nathalie Toriel), Starrick's main competitor and secretly a Templar herself; foils two Templar plots to assassinate Prime Minister Benjamin Disraeli (David Ferry) and steal the Bank of England's gold reserve; and kills Maxwell Roth (John Hopkins), leader of a Templar gang, who initially helped Jacob undermine Starrick's control on the criminal underworld, but later tricked him into bombing a building of child labourers.
** Craig Warnock – Time Bandits as Kevin
* Clooney (voiced by Craig Warnock): Dez's leprechaun dad.
